entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump Before MORON#1 appointed Kushner, (MORON#2), to lead the unofficial coronavirus task force, Kushner advised MORON#1 the virus was more dangerous to the economy than public deaths.

MORON#2, helped write MORON#1's March 11 address with 6 false claims that sunk the stock market.
